name: Khushi Soni
locations: Malaviya National Institute of Technology, Jaipur

projects.name: Bronchiolitis and Pneumonia disease prediction
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for classification of bronchiolitis and pneumonia in healthcare. Employed deep transfer learning models, including VGG16, VGG19, MobileNetV2, and InceptionResNetV2, to diagnose bronchiolitis and pneumonia in pediatric chest X-rays (PCXr). Used transfer learning and feature extraction to improve accuracy.

projects.name: Plant Leaf Disease Detection and Severity Assessment Using Deep CNN Architectures
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for automated plant leaf disease detection and severity assessment using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). Evaluated and compared the performance of pre-trained CNN architectures, including ResNet50, MobileNet, and InceptionV3, for accurate disease classification and severity grading. Utilized transfer learning to leverage pre-trained model knowledge and improve disease detection accuracy while reducing training time.

projects.name: DDoS Attack Detection using Deep Learning and Random Forest Approaches
projects.description: Developed a model to detect Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attacks on a network. Employed a hybrid approach utilizing both Deep Learning and Random Forest algorithms for classification. Preprocessed network traffic data to handle missing values and normalize features. Trained and evaluated the models to achieve high accuracy in identifying DDoS attacks.

experiences.description: Worked upon a research article that was accepted at 2023 Seventh International Conference on Image Information Processing (ICIIP). Studied about various Machine Learning and deep learning models and practiced it on some publicly available datasets. Explored various python libraries and studied the maths required for machine learning and data science.
experiences.location: Malaviya National Institute of Technology, Jaipur

full_output.name: Khushi Soni
achievements_and_awards: AI-Enhanced Diagnosis: Pediatric Chest X-ray Classification for Bronchiolitis and Pneumonia 2023 Seventh International Conference on Image Information Processing (ICIIP) | 28 May, 2024
